Mods.LoadCommand:
%xero(function(self) -- judgment / combo proxies for pn = 1, 2 do setupJudgeProxy(PJ[pn], P[pn]:GetChild('Judgment'), pn) setupJudgeProxy(PC[pn], P[pn]:GetChild('Combo'), pn) end -- player proxies for pn = 1, #PP do PP[pn]:SetTarget(P[pn]) Pp[pn]:SetTarget(P[pn]) Pp[pn]:hidden(1) P[pn]:hidden(1) end -- your code goes here here: setdefault { 2, 'xmod', 100, 'dizzyholds', 100, 'stealthpastreceptors', 100, 'modtimer', 100, 'halgun', 50, 'arrowpathdrawsizeback', 50, 'drawsizeback', -30,'plusrx', -30,'plusry', 20,'plusrz', }
fpslimit(aft1) fpslimit(blendaft)
aftsprite1:SetTexture(aft1:GetTexture()) aftsprite1:zoomx(1) aftsprite1:zoomy(1) aftsprite1:diffusealpha(1) aftsprite1:hidden(1)
blendsprite:SetTexture(blendaft:GetTexture())
exclusionshaderholder:GetShader():uniformTexture('sampler1', overlay:GetTexture()) dodgeshaderholder:GetShader():uniformTexture('sampler1', overlay2:GetTexture()) diffshaderholder:GetShader():uniformTexture('sampler1', overlay3:GetTexture())
overlay:hidden(1) overlay2:hidden(1) overlay3:hidden(1) overlay4:hidden(1)
walloftext:hidden(1) walloftext:xy(scx, scy)
masksprite:SetTexture(blendaft:GetTexture()) masksprite:GetShader():uniformTexture('sampler1', maskimage:GetTexture()) definemod {'mask', function(p) if p == 0 then masksprite:hidden(1) else masksprite:hidden(0) end masksprite:GetShader():uniform1f('limit', p) end } sprite(masksprite) masksprite:rotationz(120) masksprite:SetTextureFiltering(false) maskimage:hidden(1)
for i = 1, #spritepool do sprite(spritepool[i]) spritepool[i]:hidden(1) spritepool[i]:SetTexture(aft1:GetTexture()) end
setdefault {scx, 'xpos', scy, 'ypos', 0, 'zpos'} definemod {'xpos', function(pos, pn) P[pn]:x(pos) end} definemod {'ypos', function(pos, pn) P[pn]:y(pos) end} definemod {'zpos', function(pos, pn) P[pn]:z(pos) end}
definemod {'proxyx', function(pos) proxyframe1:x(pos + scx) end} definemod {'proxyy', function(pos) proxyframe1:y(pos + scy) end} definemod {'proxyz', function(pos) proxyframe1:z(pos + 0) end} definemod {'proxyrotx', function(pos) proxyframe2:rotationx(pos) end} definemod {'proxyroty', function(pos) proxyframe2:rotationy(pos) end} definemod {'proxyrotz', function(pos) proxyframe2:rotationz(pos) end} proxyframe3:xyz(-scx, -scy, 0)
plus:hidden(1) plus:zoomto(sw*8,sw*8) plus:texcoordvelocity(1,0) plus:diffuse(0.7,0.7,0.7,1) plus:blend('weightedmultiply') plus:customtexturerect(0,0,32,32) plus:xy(scx,scy) stripes:hidden(1) stripes:xy(scx,0) stripes:zoomto(sw*8,sw*8) stripes:blend('invertdest') aquad:SetWidth(sw) aquad:SetHeight(sh) aquad:xy(scx, scy) aquad:diffuse(0, 0, 0, 1) end)
